amendment.description: Amendment increases funds for the Non-Defense Environmental Cleanup by $4 million and reduces funds for the Salaries and Expenses of the Department of Energy by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Non-Defense Environmental Cleanup by $4 million and reduce funds for the Salaries and Expenses of the Department of Energy by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
